item.description:
The service will be conducted entirely auf Deutsch.  There will be German music by the choir and carols for you to sing in German.  After the service you are invited to a reception with German Christmas cookies usw.  They are delighted to have us there.

This is a beautiful, old-world tradition that continues at this little church in New Britain.  Please invite your friends to join us.

Herzlich willkommen!

For those of you wanting to carpool from West Hartford, please contact Jesse R who has a new van. Search the RSVP list and you will find him.
item.name: German Advent Service Gottesdienst
